review_data.title: Excellent steak, average service
review_data.content: The selection of food and drinks is poor. I have chosen a steak with local beer. I enjoyed it. Service was fast. I would say that it was a fair closing of a working day in an other country.

review_data.title: Basilico Restaurant
review_data.content: I samma byggnad som Dorint Airport Hotell. Trevlig personal, bra mat. Rekommenderar deras vegetarians alternativ.

review_data.title: Mediocre Food at high prices
review_data.content: The food is at most mediocre but the prices at the level of a decent restaurant in downtown Zurich... Moreover, some of the dishes in our party were served cold and had to be returned.

review_data.title: convenient when you're staying at Dorint Airport Hotel
review_data.content: I walked around the neighborhood and didn't see many options. The meals were more than I wanted to pay for supper. That being said, the servers were kind and helpful and hustling with a large group as well as other guests. The food was good....More

review_data.title: We enjoyed excellent buffets for both dinner and breakfast
review_data.content: Our stay at the Dorint was comp'ed by Swiss Airlines due to their delayed flight. The food at the Basilico Restaurant was excellent -- especially the freshly baked bread at dinner. If we had not been comp'ed, but had known how good it was, we...More

review_data.title: Pricy for average food
